subscription_cancel_confirmation_message: This will cancel your current subscription plan at the end of the current payment period. Are you sure you would like to continue?
subscription_cancel_success_message: You can use your current subscription until {end_date}. After this date you will still be able to access all your information on the platform but will not be able to make new tastings.
subscription_change_your_plan: To change your plan, your payment method or see your invoices please use the billing portal.
subscription_delayed_cancellation: Your subscription has been canceled. You can use your current subscription until {end_date}. After this date you will still be able to access all your information on the platform but will not be able to make new tastings. To see your invoices please use the billing portal.
subscription_payment_detail: We need your payment details now, but don't worry.
subscription_next_30: For the next 30 days you have access to features normally only included in the Pro subscription.
subscription_pay_duration: Please select your prefered billing frequency:
subscription_please_hold: Please hold on while we finish your signup
subscription_no_bill: You will not be billed today
subscription_refresh_error: We've had some trouble to complete your subscription.
subscription_please_contact: Please contact us at {email} so that we can get you on board properly.
subscription_available_discount: Discount available on all the plans during checkout
subscription_description: We've got a plan for every taster out there. Choose the one that suits you best!
subscription_select_description: You can always change your plan later
subscription_quick_tasting_desc: Unlimited usage of the essential in tasting (1-2 min)
subscription_tasting_summary_desc: Summary of your tasting, rating and tasting notes
subscription_my_tasting_desc: Storage of all of your tastings - easily accessible
subscription_event_look_up_desc: Look up previous and upcoming events
subscription_profound_tasting_desc: Unlimited usage of all aspects of tasting (5-15 min)
subscription_note_generator_desc: Automated tasting note based on your tasting
subscription_no_access: To access this feature you need to complete your signup
